Author: GitHub
Description:
Keep your Git repository clean and professional by using a .gitignore file. In this video, we explain what file exclusion is, why it matters (like avoiding those annoying .DS\_Store files on macOS), and share a pro tip on using gitignore.io to automatically generate templates for your specific OS or framework.

#Git #GitHub #githubforbeginners

Title: What is a .gitignore file and why do you need it?
